post_detail.description:
Challenge:  
This project is an excellent example of how a tight integration with various contributors to a large site like can really work and be effective.  Click3X and MRM Worldwide collaborated to produce the web experience "A World Like No Other" for the US Army. 

Execution: 
Click3X created fully CG world including an army base, mountain/desert landscape, vehicles, and Army personnel. To create this world, Click3X worked with MRM and Smuggler, the producer of the live action component, to create a fictional base modeled after real Army bases in Kentucky and Colorado.  Each fly-through then transitioned into a live action segment.  It was critical that the part that Click 3X designed and built become part of a seamless and exciting whole. 
The user experience begins with a flyover of the desert landscape and Army base. When the camera lands on an aerial view of the base, the user then has the ability to select different "hot-spots" which then initiate a camera fly over to that part of the base where the CGI transitions seamlessly to the live action webisodes.
